arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Parisian lineup announced with a great comeback
arts.sum: This Friday, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will face Angers (7th) at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). This Friday, Le Parisien predicted a likely Parisian lineup with João Neves back from suspension. Kvaratskhelia – Dembélé – Doué Ruiz – Zaïre-Emery – Neves Mendes – Pacho – […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Bad news, a forfeit is looming on the Parisian side
arts.sum: This Friday, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) faces Angers (7th) at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Luis Enrique has strong words: Chevalier, Parc, transfer window and unpredictability
arts.sum: On Friday, during Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will face Angers (7th) at the Parc des Princes (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Official medical update: 1 Parisian will be missing
arts.sum: This Friday, second-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face seventh-placed Angers at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). After Friday’s training session, on the eve of the match, the club provided an injury update. The medical update for Thursday 21st August concerns Senny Mayulu. Senny Mayulu continues […]

arts.ttl: Gianluigi Donnarumma still training with PSG ahead of Angers clash
arts.sum: Gianluigi Donnarumma was once again present at PSG training on Thursday morning, just a day before Luis Enrique’s side host Angers at the Parc des Princes in the second round…

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – The start of Parisian training live this Thursday.
arts.sum: This Thursday, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will be training at the PSG Campus at 11 a.m. to prepare for Friday evening’s match against Angers (7th) at the Parc des Princes on Matchday 1 of Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET).
